system.description: You can create magic weapons, armor, and shields.
system.benefit:
You can create magic weapons, armor, and shields. Enhancing a weapon, suit of armor, or shield takes one day for each 1,000 gp in the price of its magical features. To create a magic weapon, piece of armor, or shield, you must use up raw materials costing half of its base price. See the magic item creation rules in Chapter 7 for more information.

The weapon, armor, or shield to be enhanced must be a masterwork item that you provide. Its cost is not included in the above cost.

You can also mend a broken magic weapon, suit of armor, or shield if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the XP it would take to craft that item in the first place.
